attributes.action: explain why he, as an unelected Prime Minister has so many unelected appointees in his Cabinet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action. In accordance with the terms and conditions of the site we do not accept words such as 'explain' as a valid action. Please rephrase your petition and resubmit.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
